item.title: By: Claude Betancourt
item.dc:creator: Claude Betancourt
item.description: Are you sure it was an Android device and not a Windows 7 phone? :)
item.content:encoded: Are you sure it was an Android device and not a Windows 7 phone? ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/11/30/android-reboot/#comment-3580">Utahcon</a>.
I think it is stock Android, though I don't know that for sure.
I'm not sure what the details are for his phone, I didn't get a chance to play with it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Utahcon.

I think it is stock Android, though I don’t know that for sure.

I’m not sure what the details are for his phone, I didn’t get a chance to play with it.

item.title: By: Utahcon
item.dc:creator: Utahcon
item.description:
Is he running stock Android or a ROM? What version of Android?
I know they have made huge improvements in the later version of Android's OS, and depending on the rom, carrier, vendor, and phone itself he may have created his own problems.
item.content:encoded:
Is he running stock Android or a ROM? What version of Android?

I know they have made huge improvements in the later version of Android’s OS, and depending on the rom, carrier, vendor, and phone itself he may have created his own problems.
